title: Vocational Education via Blended Learning: Strengthening Social Sector Competencies

context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals who study in a digital-device-provided environment but have limited experience with VR/AR technologies. Project-based assessments measure practical competencies.

learning_goals: Learners apply knowledge related to social sector job functions (community development, policy analysis, etc.) in blended learning environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners successfully complete group projects with peers using online collaboration tools at least three times
Learners combine self-directed LMS-based learning with weekly real-time sessions to submit monthly practical application reports
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
